text: 14.3: Sng 149.1; Ais 42.10; VB 5.9; 7.4; 15.3Mba gumgi gu mbigi, mbe Fhe Bakɨme ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan pigi mpirmpirɨga nɨma thivgiap, vhɨra mba ŋamki fethɨgi bigi nɨma thivgiap, mba gumgir pani nɨman thivgiap, ŋgava kama mbe mbui. Mba 144,000 gumgi gu mbigi, Fhe Bakɨme kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi rɨgar mbera vhezgi. Maaŋ muuŋgiap, mbe nduarira mba ŋgava kaŋgirga.
